name: Over Jump (minze_melone)
description:
Platformer with the goal of reaching the top of the map

Desktop version comes with standalone level creator.

Credits:

UI icons https://leo-red.itch.io/lucid-icon-pack

Sounds https://leohpaz.itch.io/rpg-essentials-sfx-free

Crosshair https://kenney-assets.itch.io/crosshair-pack

Blocks https://poloviiinkin.itch.io/textures

Background https://screamingbrainstudios.itch.io/seamless-sky-backgrounds

Made with raylib
